name: Slide.js
body:
### Get everthing suit up
```html
<link rel="stylesheet" href="./slide.css">
<script src="./slide.js"></script>
```

### Default
```js
new Slide('#slide', {
    imgs: [
        './dist/imgs/1.gif',
        './dist/imgs/2.gif',
        './dist/imgs/3.gif',
    ]
})
```

### Animation: slideLeft
```js
new Slide('#slide', {
    imgs: [
        './dist/imgs/1.gif',
        './dist/imgs/2.gif',
        './dist/imgs/3.gif',
    ],
    animation: 'slideLeft'
})
```

### Animation: fade
```js
new Slide('#slide', {
    imgs: [
        './dist/imgs/1.gif',
        './dist/imgs/2.gif',
        './dist/imgs/3.gif',
    ],
    animation: 'fade'
})
```

### Autoswitch
```js
new Slide('#slide', {
    imgs: [
        './dist/imgs/1.gif',
        './dist/imgs/2.gif',
        './dist/imgs/3.gif',
    ],
    autoswitch: {
        open: true,
        delay: 3000
    }
})
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
